text: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

translation.en: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Cukuplah Allah menjadi saksi antara aku dan kamu sekalian. Sungguh, Dia Maha Mengetahui, Maha Melihat akan hamba-hamba-Nya
